overview: The story of an ambitious schoolboy, Gary Worrall (played by Christien Anholt), who sets out to make Â£1M during his half term school break! He is aided and abetted in this adventure by his school mate Brian Thurrock (Paul Reynolds). All goes smoothly until he meets the beautiful Lisa (Jayne Ashbourne) and he realises that life in the 'real' world is much more complicated than the theory in the classroom!
title: Money For Nothing
